acupoint.standard_location: 在耳轮脚分叉处稍上方的三角窝内
acupoint.standard_location_en: In the triangular fossa of the ear, at the apex of the triangular fossa, slightly above where the helix crus bifurcates
acupoint.simple_method: 耳朵上方三角形凹陷区域的顶端
acupoint.simple_method_en: In the upper triangular hollow of the ear, at its apex.
acupoint.anatomical: 耳廓软骨，耳大神经分布区
functions: 镇静安神 (sedate and calm spirit)
